questions.question: What is the main difference between half-adders and full-adders?

answers.a: Nothing basically; full-adders are made up of two half-adders
answers.b: Full-adders can handle double digit numbers
answers.c: Full-adders have a carry input capability
answers.d: Half-adders can only handle single digit numbers
